interactions.text: A model 486 computer, it looks like it's been here for years. \n I wonder if it still works?
I wonder if there is treasure in here

These Pipes are helping to vent the excess heat from the server farms.  \n They prevent overheating of our Vault's core systems.  \n The infrastructure that keeps us safe here, requires a lot of power.
This is one of the servers in the Vault Engineering deck. \n Without these machine keeping the day to day running of the Vault in check.  \n life would be a lot more difficult for all of us.
This is one of the Coolent Pools, full of coolent liquid. \n It's used to keep the servers from overheating.  \n The liquid is pumped around the server farm to keep the temperature down.
Art to keep us happy I guess.
